snippet: Eve Arnold, the first woman to become a full member of Magnum Photos, died on Wednesday. She was 99.
abstract: Eve Arnold, the first woman to become a full member of Magnum Photos, died on Wednesday. She was 99.
lead_paragraph: She was the first woman to become a full member of the storied Magnum Photos cooperative - not quite a feminist, but someone who believed that women saw the world through a different lens. Petite but powerful, she will be remembered for her generous spirit and her compassionate eye.
